titleStmt.title: To the Reuerend Father in God, THEOPHILVS, Lord Bishop of Landaffe, my worthy Diocesan.
titleStmt.author: Stradling, John

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: To the Reuerend Father in God, THEOPHILVS, Lord Bishop of Landaffe, my worthy Diocesan.
analytic.author: Stradling, John

monogr.title: Diuine poemes : In seuen seuerall classes. Written to his most excellent Maiestie Charles, by the grace of God King of Great Britaine, France, and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. By Sr. Iohn Stradling Knight and Baronet
monogr.author: Stradling, John, Sir

div.head: To the Reuerend Father in God, THEOPHILVS, Lord Bishop of Landaffe, my worthy Diocesan.
Sent with the Copie, to be pervsed.

lg.l: LOe, here a Childe of mine in Sacred Font
To you (my Lord) reflect your eye vpon't,
I'm suertie for his Christian education.
Then on his Head impose your hand, and blesse,
If you approue the Faith he doth confesse.

closer.signed: Your Lordships very louing friend, IOH. STRADLING.
